idea: KINO EYE STUDIOS is a 360 degree creative agency working to provide content based services for a wide range of clients. Right from a scratch idea to developing the nascent concept into visually engaging and enthralling content is what Kino Eye thrive to deliver. Few of our services include Rebranding, 360 degree product placement, integrating brands with digital and theatrical distributors and platforms for a long term promotional and marketing campaign. Apart from this we are also into production of content for all formats, production of international video campaigns in India, social media campaigns for international brands and international publications and printed content production.
name: KINO EYE STUDIOS

idea:
We introduce ourselves as “RYKKA CORPORATION PRIVATE LIMITED” building inroads into new and exciting domains, as well as fundamentally strong companies. As Angel investors, we are successful and industrious individuals and we bring the ability to provide capital for a variety of ventures that include some innovative start-ups as well.

To fund a diverse mix of small and large businesses involved in key sectors as well as innovative start-up ventures that will go on to add value to industry and society.

We believe our essence is in providing financial and advisory services to help start-ups, businessman, entrepreneurs and all other people seeking for financial advice for various business activities.
